column5: For the first time ever i got to do some ice fishing in November Down here in Penna. I got out fot  a few hours on friday and ended up with 6 pickeral and 1 perch but anytime i can get out this early it was great.

Glad to hear you had a great day out on the first ice of the season !!!!   are you on a higher elevation ???.cause here in southern ontario,there is no safe ice yet,up north there is and a few guys have been hardwater fishin for almost 2 weeks now !!! thanks for sharing...cheers
there is a plateau in the pocono mts. that is at about 2000 ft plus the lake that we fished is only 4-6 ft deep at the max.
more hardwater teaser pics for us eh....pike and perch on ice
Great stuff Ranger22 Glad you are able to get out on ice and get your first few  Good job and thanks for sharing Leechman
Is that a real pickeral on the ice, or were you just calling your six walleye pickeral so we would know what you were talking about?
That's what I was thinking.  The first fish is sure looking like a pike.. unless its a chain/grass pickerel.  I assume that's what he means.
Yea that's a chain pickeral not a good pic it flopped right when i snapped it.
So if we as canucks call walleye pickeral, what are we supposed to call pickeral - mini pike? walleye?
We should call them what they are.
